items.title: MCMC Probes TikTok Over Alleged Drug-Smuggling Recruitment
items.summary:

items.title: One of the best Black Friday 2025 deals is already live – M4 MacBook Air at $250 off (All-time low)
items.summary:
Black Friday month 2025 is off to a seriously notable start. Alongside the usual smattering of early discounts we see just about every year from select brands, the early sales have also ushered in seriously notable and all-time low pricing on major 2025 tech releases – retailers typically make folks wait for these sorts of discounts until much later in the month. Alongside the all-time low pricing on the new Google Pixel devices, one of the particularly standout offers delivers new Amazon all-time low pricing across the 2025 MacBook Air lineup.

items.summary:
Greesum 31-Gallon Resin Deck Box

Buy for $29 (Reg. $35)

What we love

Depending on where you live, snow may start to fly in the near future (it’s slated to hit where I live this weekend). For the folks that still have a bit of tidying up to do in the yard, this sort of outdoor-ready storage can really come in handy. It boasts a 31-gallon storage cavity and when closed it can also be used for seating.

items.title: Add front and rear coverage to your car with REDTIGER’s F7NP dual dash cam at $85 (Reg. $130)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, REDTIGER is offering its F7NP Front and Rear Dash Cam for $85.48 shipped. Coming down off its $130 full price tag, we saw regular discounts taking the costs down to $90 until July, when that month’s Prime Day event first gave us the first drop to this rate, which has been regularly returning in the months since. While it has gone lower in the past, you’re still getting another shot at this solid 43% markdown that cuts $45 off the tag for one of its lowest prices at Amazon.

You’ll find deals on everything from jeans and chinos to jackets and shirts, available in a wide range of sizes, styles, colors, and even Big & Tall options. Whether you’re restocking your denim or looking to upgrade to a different style, now’s the time to score some classic Levi’s jeans at a fraction of the cost. Shop the full Levi’s sale on Amazon here.

items.title: Cash in during Lectric’s Black Friday battery sale with up to 25% off new and legacy models starting from $270
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing early Black Friday Sale, Lectric has now launched a Black Friday battery sale with up to 25% savings across a large collection of spare batteries that you can use to double your range and prolong travel times, with prices starting at $270 shipped and ranging up to $595 shipped. Usually for discounts on extra batteries, you’d have to be lucky to catch some of the rare instances of free inclusions, with occasional models getting up to 30% discounts alongside e-bike purchases, but again, these are rare occurrences. While this side sale continues you’ll be able to grab one for any XP4, XPeak, XPedition, XPress, XP Lite, ONE, and older XP 3.0 e-bikes you already own with up to $211 in savings at some of their best prices. Head below to check out the full lineup while they’re still around.
